name: Lindsay Johnston
text: What's not to love? I really like how you can now get a card and play by the hour instead of by the number of coins you have. It's nice on the wallet. Food could be cheaper but still a fun place for the family.

name: Crazy Mommy Blog
text: This place was busy but fun.  We came for my sons birthday party.  There was plenty of seating available.  The food was great in taste and smell.  People were helpful and relatively friendly.  I like the stamps you get to match your kids to help protect the kids.
